modulations:
ellipsoid let (e=2) [r * sqrt(pow(abs(cos(theta)),2)+ e*pow(abs(sin(theta)),2)), theta,phi]
egg [r*(1.0 - 0.5*pow(0.8*(cos(theta+60)),2)), theta,phi]
berry [r*(1.0+ 0.5*pow(1.1*(cos(1*theta)),3)), theta,phi]
cushion [r*(1.0 - 0.5*pow(0.9*cos(theta),2)), theta, phi]
bauble [r*(1- 0.5*sin(theta*2) + 0.1* sin(theta)*sqrt(abs(cos(theta*2)))) / (sin(theta)), theta,phi] #
bigbauble [r*(1+abs(cos(theta*1.5))), theta,phi ]
superegg let (n=2.6,e=1.2) [ r* (pow( pow(abs(cos(theta)),n) + e*pow(abs(sin(theta)),n) ,-1/n)) ,theta,phi]
top [r*(1+abs(cos(theta*2))), theta,phi ]
double [r*(1+abs(cos(theta*2))), theta,phi ]
